abstract: The two soft drink giants have agreed to stop directly financing research that uses animals to test or develop their products.
snippet: The two soft drink giants have agreed to stop directly financing research that uses animals to test or develop their products.
lead_paragraph: ATLANTA, May 30 — Under pressure from animal rights advocates, two soft drink giants, Coca-Cola and PepsiCo, have agreed to stop directly financing research that uses animals to test or develop their products, except where such testing is required by law.

headline.main: Coca-Cola and PepsiCo Agree to Curb Animal Tests
headline.print_headline: Coca-Cola And PepsiCo Agree to Curb Animal Tests

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals

abstract: The two soft drink giants agreed to stop financing animal experiments, except where such testing is required by law.
snippet: The two soft drink giants agreed to stop financing animal experiments, except where such testing is required by law.
lead_paragraph: ATLANTA, Ga., May 30 — Under pressure from animal rights activists, two soft drink giants, Coca-Cola and Pepsico, have agreed to stop directly financing research that uses animals to test or develop their products, except where such testing is required by law.

headline.main: Pepsi and Coke Agree to Stop Financing Research That Uses Animals
